mapper.insert: INSERT INTO realestate.market_item (item_uid, quantity, current_quantity, start_at, end_at, price, transaction_hash) VALUES(#{itemUid}, #{quantity}, #{currentQuantity}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{price} ,#{transactionHash})
mapper.select: SELECT mi.uid, mi.created_at, mi.updated_at, mi.deleted_flag, mi.used_flag, mi.item_uid, mi.quantity, mi.current_quantity, mi.start_at, mi.end_at, mi.price, mi.transaction_hash, mi.sell_id, mi.nft_id, mi.minting_status, i.member_uid , i.allocation_uid , acc.name AS allocation_name, i.status_uid , scc.name AS status_name, i.image_uri , i.project_name, i.total_price, i.allocation_day, i.`right`, i.location, i.core_value, i.area, i.`scale`, i.purpose, i.company_name, i.approval_at, i.website_uri, i.detail, i.token_uri, m.wallet_address FROM realestate.market_item AS mi LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.item AS i ON mi.item_uid = i.uid AND i.deleted_flag = false AND i.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN realestate.`member` m ON i.member_uid = m.uid AND m.deleted_flag = false AND m.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code AS acc ON i.allocation_uid = acc.uid AND acc.deleted_flag = false AND acc.used_flag = true LEFT OUTER JOIN common_code AS scc ON i.status_uid = scc.uid AND scc.deleted_flag = false AND scc.used_flag = true WHERE mi.deleted_flag = false AND mi.used_flag = true AND mi.uid = #{uid}
